column1: The Purple Pig////Honestly was pretty disappointed with this place. Everyone used to rave about purple pig being a good restaurant but all of the food was very average. All of the food was basic. Whatever you do don't order the octopus. Biggest waste of money
column2: the consistency was gross and no flavor. Tasted like cheap frozen fish. Our server was nice
column3: no issues there. Just really really mediocre food for the $200 we spent
